alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued February 24 at 1:48PM PST until February 25 at 8:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 8 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 27 degrees. * WHERE...San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 8 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing

area.areaDesc: San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire
